title: Speaking effectively...to one or one thousand
creator_credit: Sunset Films, Toastmasters International and Bert Decker
brief_description: Many people find public speaking to be a terrifying experience. However, this fear is a learned response. The underlying purpose of this film is to link public speaking to everyday interpersonal communication and to explain key communication factors.
creator_credit_for_label: Sunset Films, Toastmasters International and Bert Decker
